name: Lang-8
overview:
Lang-8 is a language exchange website Native speakers will help you correct journal entries in the language that you’re learning, and you can do the same to help them out as well. If you’re learning another language, whether you are a beginner, intermediate, or advanced, there is no better way than interacting with native speakers of the language that you’re learning. Here’s how Lang-8 works.

1) Write Journal Entries in the Language that You’re Learning: Lang-8 makes it easy to write entries, reviews, and more in the language that you’re learning. It’s a great way to get better quickly.

2) Native Speakers Correct Your Entries: Whenever you write something new, native speakers come in and correct your entries. Corrections are easy to see and understand so you can learn as much as possible.

3) Help Others: The Lang-8 community is super-friendly. Come join us and see for yourself!

More than 70 languages are available in Lang-8. We have users from 180 Countries.
